body.p: Paragraphs 1.3, 1.5 and 1.10 differ from the 1989 Framework and Concepts Statement 1 for two reasons—to eliminate differences between the 1989 Framework and Concepts Statement 1 and to be more direct by focusing on users making decisions relating to providing resources (but not to exclude advisers). The reasons are discussed in paragraphs BC1.15–BC1.17 and BC1.21–BC1.26.
